channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform 4.12
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform 4.12

item.title: CVE-2024-3154|2024-05-29T21:22:18.895Z -- Red Hat -- Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform 4.12
item.description: A flaw was found in cri-o, where an arbitrary systemd property can be injected via a Pod annotation. Any user who can create a pod with an arbitrary annotation may perform an arbitrary action on the host system.

item.title: CVE-2024-3154|2024-05-27T05:27:13.085Z -- Red Hat -- Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform 4.12
item.description: A flaw was found in cri-o, where an arbitrary systemd property can be injected via a Pod annotation. Any user who can create a pod with an arbitrary annotation may perform an arbitrary action on the host system.

item.title: CVE-2024-1139|2024-05-21T18:54:15.167Z -- Red Hat -- Red Hat OpenShift Container Platform 4.12
item.description: A credentials leak vulnerability was found in the cluster monitoring operator in OCP. This issue may allow a remote attacker who has basic login credentials to check the pod manifest to discover a repository pull secret.
